segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink, creating a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how the woman doesn't notice it at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching this happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, drying that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's ever going to look down and see the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just cascading down the cabinets, what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone should really tell her what's going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't slip and hurt herself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is quite a sight, so much water and she's missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
